title: Hoi sin spicy chicken noodles
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons rapeseed or groundnut oil', '5cm piece root ginger, finely sliced', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '4 fresh chillies, finely sliced', '1 white onion, diced', '1 handful beansprouts', '1 green pepper, diced', 'rice wine vinegar to taste', 'light soy sauce to taste', '500g thinly sliced chicken breast', '1 pack straight-to-wok egg noodles', '2 teaspoons hoi sin sauce, or to taste']
